mapper.insert: insert into io_source_history (sourceID, `userID`,`fileID`, `size`, `detail`, createTime, modifyTime) values ( #{sourceID}, #{userID}, #{fileID}, #{size}, #{detail}, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()) )

insert into io_source_history (sourceID, `userID`,`fileID`, `size`, `detail`, createTime, modifyTime) values
( #{item.sourceID}, #{item.userID}, #{item.fileID}, #{item.size}, #{item.detail}, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()) )
mapper.select:
select se.id, se.sourceID, se.`fileID`,se.`userID`, se.`size`, se.`detail`, f.createTime, u.avatar, CASE WHEN u.nickname is null or u.nickname = '' THEN u.`name` else u.nickname end nickname, u.sex,u.`status` ,io.targetType,io.isFolder,io.fileType,f.path,fm.`value`, f.hashMd5,io.`name` from io_source_history se LEFT JOIN io_source io on se.sourceID = io.sourceID LEFT JOIN io_file f on se.fileID = f.fileID left join `io_file_meta` fm on se.fileID = fm.fileID and fm.`key` = 'fileInfoMore' left join `user` u on se.userID = u.userID where se.sourceID = #{sourceID} order by se.createTime desc, se.id desc
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(1) from io_source_history se where se.sourceID = #{sourceID}
mapper.update: update `io_source_history` set `detail` = #{detail}, modifyTime = unix_timestamp(now()) where id = #{id}
update `io_source_history` set `detail` = #{detail}, `fileID` = #{fileID}, `userID` = #{userID}, `size` = #{size}, modifyTime = unix_timestamp(now()) where id = #{id}
update `io_source` set `fileID` = #{fileID}, `size` = #{size}, `modifyUser` = #{userID}, modifyTime = unix_timestamp(now()) where sourceID = #{sourceID}
mapper.select: select f.fileID, f.`name` , f.hashMd5, f.size, f.path, s.fileType, s.parentID, s.sourceID, s.isFolder, s.parentLevel, s.targetType, s.`name` sourceName from io_source_history se LEFT JOIN io_source s on se.sourceID = s.sourceID left join io_file f ON f.fileID = se.fileID where se.id = #{id}
select id, sourceID, fileID, `size`,userID from io_source_history where sourceID = #{sourceID} and fileID = #{fileID} limit 1
